name: Ol' Saint Wick
description:
GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam Submission.

Just started my indie game dev journey roughly 3 weeks ago and wanted to challenge myself by joining the jam.

There are a few bugs that I am aware of and I could not figure out how to let the player win so the game should be unbeatable on purpose. This is so you don't get stuck in the game. Will correct this and other areas after the game jam (Can't change now due to rules ;) )

Thanks for playing!!
